title: La Masajista Vocacional 1981 Adriana Vega, Sara Mora, María Salerno, Marisa Porcel, Mónica Cano, Mery Leyva

sources.title: La Masajista Vocacional 1981 Adriana Vega, Sara Mora, María Salerno, Marisa Porcel, Mónica Cano, Mery Leyva
sources.description: La Masajista Vocacional - The professional masseuse (rough probably inaccurate translation).  Apparently the plot is a Pelota player gets hit in the privates with a ball and goes to a masseuse for treatment. It must work wonders because the next moment he is cheerfully assaulting her. This being a 1981 post Franco Spanish movie, she is fine with it. The women do seem to extract some revenge with the therapy/torture devices they treat their patients with. Spanish only, could not find subtitles,
